form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Application for Adjustment of Status,, I-4129.

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/24/2023 12. I list below all organizations, societies, clubs, and associations, past or present, in which I have held membership in the United States or a foreign country, and the periods and places of such membership. (If you have never. been a member of any organization, state "None.") 13. I claim have None have been charged no with palilical of law (other than minor traffic application violations). (If you have been not a violation ever charged with a violation of law, give date and place and nature of each charge and the final result., never 14. I have have not requested exemption or discharge from training or service in the Armed Forces of the United States. (If you have ever requested exemption or discharge from training or service in the Armed Forces of the United States, give date and place of your request, the reason for such request, and specify to whom it was made.) never 15. Deportation proceedings have have not been instituted against me in the United States. (If deportation proceedings have ever been instituted against you, give the date and place of hearing, the charge, and the final result., new 16. I have have not been a participant in a designated exchange program. (If you have been a participant, show dates of arrival (1st umm and departure from U.S. 17. (If you have checked Block A or B of Item 1, complete this item.) An immigrant visa is now available to me because: a. I registered on the consular waiting list at the American Consulate at Hong Kong on (City) immediate relative b. A visa petition according me preference status was approved by the district director at (Place) on (Date) c. A visa petition has not been approved in my behalf but I claim eligibility for immediate relative or preference status because my spouse my parent is the beneficiary of a visa petition approved by the district director at (City) on (Date) d. Other (explain) 18. (If you have checked Block B of Item 1, complete this item. A. I have have not been absent from the United States during the past two years. (If you have been absent, attach a separate statement listing the port, date and means of each departure from and return to the United States.) B. The country from which I fled or the place from which I have been uprooted is China C. The reasons I left and the reasons I am unable or unwilling to return to that country or place are Dislike the Communist ideas and life 19. (If you have checked Block C or D of Item 1, complete this item.) A. I first arrived in the United States at on by means of (Port) (Date) was I was not inspected by an immigration officer. (Name of ship or mode of travel) B. I entered the United States under the name and I was destined to (Name at time of entry) I was coming to join (City and State) (Name and relationship) have C. Since my first entry I have not been absent from the United States. (If you have been absent, attach a separate statement listing the port, date and means of each departure from and return to the United States. 20. have have not heretofore filed an application for the status of a permanent resident. (If you have ever filed such application, give the date and place of filing and final disposition.) 21.
